name: Cave Game (KyleGabiane)
description:
Cave Game is a 2D Platformer game.  Going to have more updates in the future.

Game made by Team GoldenTigers.

Team Name: Kyle Gabiane & Aidan Millington 

Controls Keyboard:

Right and Left to move character.

SpacerBar or Up button to jump.

Left click mouse to melee attack,
